name: UpdateActionConnection
description:
Update an existing action connection in Datadog.

This tool updates an action connection in Datadog using the provided connection ID. Ensure you have a registered application key before calling this tool.

parameters.name: action_connection_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the action connection to be updated in Datadog.

value_schema.description: The ID of the action connection

parameters.name: action_connection_update_request
parameters.description: JSON object containing data for updating an action connection. Includes attributes like name and integration details.

data.description: Data related to the connection update.

value_schema.description: Update an existing Action Connection request body

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: connection_id
parameters.description: The ID of the action connection

value_schema.description: The ID of the action connection

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: Update an existing Action Connection request body

data.description: Data related to the connection update.

value_schema.description: Update an existing Action Connection request body
